TopicTitle: [SOLVED] MechJeb missing orbit info, vessel info, and surface info panels

Articles.Content:
Solution: Re-create the windows using the Custom Window Editor, MechJeb 2 is still in a pre-release state so there may be the occasional bug.

Pretty much exactly what the title of this thread says, they're just not there... At all. I'm using MechJeb 2.0.7.

Has anybody else had this issue or have any idea how to fix it?

Edited May 16, 2013 by CoriW
do all the other panels work? can you post a screenshot?

Delete mechjeb.cfg in the plugindata folder.

Just tried that, the problem is still persisting.

do all the other panels work? can you post a screenshot?
You have to create your own orbit and vessel info panels by using the custom window editor.

Hmmm... The Destroyer is correct. Deleting the mechjeb.cfg in the plugindata folder has always fixed the problem of missing panels for me. Did you quit KSP before deleting the file and restart it again afterwards?

But it appears that you have MechJeb 2, and I'm never used that version. So maybe something is different there.

EDIT: Ah...ShroomOfDoom sounds like he knows what he's talking about.

You have to create your own orbit and vessel info panels by using the custom window editor.

The Vessel, Surface, and Orbit info panels were there before (In the same version I'm using now.) so they should still be there.

EDIT: Actually it may have been 2.0.6 I was using before... Hmm...

EDIT2: I just went and checked the MechJeb change log, and it says nothing about removing those windows in 2.0.7, meaning they should be there still.

Hmmm... The Destroyer is correct. Deleting the mechjeb.cfg in the plugindata folder has always fixed the problem of missing panels for me. Did you quit KSP before deleting the file and restart it again afterwards?

But it appears that you have MechJeb 2, and I'm never used that version. So maybe something is different there.

Yeah I'm using MechJeb 2.0.7, and I did close the game before deleting the plugindata folder. I have also just uninstalled and re-installed the mod entirely and it's still not showing those panels.

Edited May 16, 2013 by CoriW
Please keep in mind that MechJeb 2.07 is still a test version,so hiccups like vanishing panels can happen from time to time. Just recreate them by using the custom window editor.

Please keep in mind that MechJeb 2.07 is still a test version,so hiccups like vanishing panels can happen from time to time. Just recreate them by using the custom window editor.

Yeah I forgot when I made this thread that it was still pre-release, I'll just make my own windows then.
